subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees, who trailed, 6-1, after five innings, scored twice in the top of the ninth, buoyed by a go-ahead single by Marcus Thames, before Mariano Rivera completed a masterly night by the bullpen.
snippet: The Yankees, who trailed, 6-1, after five innings, scored twice in the top of the ninth, buoyed by a go-ahead single by Marcus Thames, before Mariano Rivera completed a masterly night by the bullpen.
